Detailed Description

The interface for all map layers. All map layers must implement this interface.

Definition at line 47 of file GIS.IMapLayer.cs.

Member Function Documentation

Draw the features of the layer to the MapMetrics.Canvas (bitmap).

string [] ShapeDotNet.GIS.IMapLayer.QueryPoint (  int  x,
int  y
) 
 

Return the name/value associated with the geographic object located at x,y. Local X coordinate. Local Y coordinate. A string array of attributes represented by the object at x,y.
